title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, who threatens Gotham City with chaos and destruction.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family on Pandora, but an old threat resurfaces.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
